description:
A colourful egg has revealed an amazing "Legend of the War Wolves" car, and Wolffy has entered a new generation of catching sheep with speed. On the other hand, the little sheep also got a splendid and novel car from the colourful egg. A new round of wolf-sheep chase is about to start. This time, the confrontation between sheep and wolves not only enhances the speed, but also increases the laughter. From the grassland to the air, and then from the air to the sea, Wolffy is driving the "Legend of the Wolf", and has prepared new tricks and weapons to catch the sheep. The little sheep, on the other hand, resolves all kinds of difficulties with their wit and courage. Thus, the wolf and the sheep together perform a racing story full of speed, dynamics and laughter.
source: bgm.tv/deepl

OTHER: 33:喜羊羊与灰太狼之开心方程式

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tailang: Kaixin Fangshenshi
喜羊羊与灰太狼之开心方程式
